title: AGV K6

product_details.description: Incredibly light sport-touring helmet offering MotoGP-level safety for everyday riding.

analysis: The K6 stands out as one of the lightest road helmets available today thanks to its carbon-aramid shell. Despite its low weight, it maintains top-tier impact dispersion capabilities through a 5-density EPS liner. Aerodynamics are optimized for multiple riding positions, from upright commuting to tucked sport riding.
